11111.content:
Walking back in, she turned her head to see something she really didn't expect; you were knelt in front of the sofa while your sister rested her dirty, smelly socked feet on your face. The weirdest part was that you weren't struggling, you were just sitting there smelling them. "Ahem." your sister immediately swung her feet off your face while turning her head to see who it was. When confronted with the fresh air, your red face took a deep breath and smiled, until you saw your mother. Both of their faces dropped, Amy flushed with guilt, and yours blushing with shame.

"What was that just now?" she demanded to know, you were so embarrassed that you were caught doing something you never wanted anyone to see, let alone do in the first place. Your sister knew she was in trouble and started fumbling "B-..I-...He-..." but your mother cut her off. "Why were you using Stan as a footrest?" She demanded! Suddenly Amy was hit by the brain wave of the century. "Well, Mom, he has a foot fetish!" she said boldly, your mouth dropped and you were about to speak before Amy turned her head to you with the look you knew all to well; the "Do it or die" look. Turning back to your mom, she started to convince her "You saw, he wasn't trying to get them off or leave because he loves feet. For a while now, Stan's been begging me to let him do all sorts of things to my feet."

Your mother had a look of disbelief, but when she finally absorbed that and the fact you didn't object, it must have been true! She smiled pleasantly, walking around and sitting on the couch. "Oh Stan why didn't you ever tell me?" You didn't know what to say, now you had to tell your mother why you didn't "choose" her feet. "I-..Er...Thought you would be mad and think I'm a freak?" You tried, Amy was sporting a confident smile but in her head she was screaming victory cries. Gina finally said "Oh I don't, and when I get back I don't mind helping you indulge in your liking for feet! In fact." She took off her sandal and raised her foot to your face, it was almost as big as Amy's. Her dirty, size 8 soles were caked in dirt turning them a murky brown.

"Give my foot a quick cleaning." You swallowed hard, you felt like bursting into tears but the week while your mother was gone would be even worse if you messed this up and got Amy in trouble. Leaning forwards, still on your knees, you took hold of her foot and brought your face close. You took a deep breath and started coughing, but managed to move in close despite the smell so intense you'd rather bathe in Amy's foot sweat. Sticking your tongue out all the way, you began licking across the ball of her foot. You could taste the grime and the acrid tang of foot sweat. Gina was taken aback by the feeling of your soft, wet tongue worshiping her foot. After a short while of licking the ball, you moved onto the arch where there was much less dirt. That barely took two minutes but it was still the most degrading thing you'd ever done especially with your evil genius of a sister watching her handiwork come to life.

Finally, you started sucking the dirt from her heel while sliding your tongue over it. Five minutes later your mother looked at her watch and realized she was running late and you were free. Gina got a mean smile on her face, trying to play into what she thought her darling son wanted with his fetish for being dominated with feet "Beg for me to let you do this again when I get back and seal it by kissing my big toe." You swallowed what grime you still had on your tongue and said "Mom, I'm on my knees, I'm begging you. Please give me the honor of becoming your....foot slave." There's a sentence you never thought you'd say to anyone, least of all to your own mother! You placed your pursed lips on her big toe and gave it a soft kiss. She laughed, rubbed your head and kissed Amy on the forehead. "Well bye you two, I'll be back in no time." She got up and left having forgotten what she came back in for.

You started coughing and spitting up what you'd just taken in while Amy burst into a fit of maniacal laughter. "I've done it! I got mom to make you her foot slave! And now that she thinks you like it I'll be able to use you too!" You started to object. "What if I t-" She cut you off and continued "And if you EVER tell mom you don't like feet, I'll punish you so bad you'll wish you could go back to licking the grime off of my toes..." Her tone had changed from total bliss to something that made you nod your head and gulp in fear.

"I don't want to do this!"

"Now Stan if you don't do this you'll regret it. I control your grades, you have no social life, getting into a good college is the last refuge you might have less. Be a good boy and be my foot bitch or you'll never have a future!" She threatened. She relished trapping you and putting you in your place... what do you do?

1111122111121112111.content:
Not wanting to make things even worse for yourself you do as your told. You begin to lick the dusty soles of her flats. You hate yourself for doing it and you hate the superior smirk that crosses your teacher's face.

"That's a good little foot boy, do as you are told."

The dust wasn't pleasant though considering the suffering you've had to endure recently it wasn't too bad. It was the humiliation that was the worst part. You continue to lick and have to listen to her snide comments about you.

"You really were born for this. Based on your grades you are obviously sub par in the intelligence category."

"You aren't popular."

"You have no athletic ability."

"This really is where you belong, beneath the feet and shoes of superior people."

Your insides knot up, this was horrible. Not only were you doing this horrible task but you were being verbally denigrated. What was worse was that those words were starting to sink in. Maybe you did deserve to be here, you weren't popular, athletic or smart. What did you have to offer the world? More and more it was sounding like nothing.

Eventually you finally get her flats completely clean. What will happen next?
1111122111121112111.title: You obey.

choices: 'Massage my sweaty, panty hosed feet'
'Clean the insides of my flats'
111112211112111212.content:
'Go on, I really want to see you do it' said your new tormentor. There you were. On your knees. Looking solemnly at her black, patterned flats, as she lifted her right foot. Slowly. Very slowly, as if to tease you and humiliate you to the highest degree, her foot was raised just above your now insignificant face. Her foot twitched. You just sat still, looking right at the dirty sole. Who knows what was on it. However, it wasn't the worst you've had to endure as one time, Amy literally smeared mud off of her "freshly" used football boots after a rainy day. The teacher only stays in school the whole day so you thought it wasn't that bad, yet you still hesitated.

'Hesitating again, are we?' She said jocularly. Her playful expression just annoyed you so much. How could she be so damn positive after just asking you to kiss the bottoms of her flats? To add salt to the injury, she gave you a slight nudge with her flat's toe, right in between your eyes. You wanted to burst out in rage right there and then but you thought better of it. One slap-mark on my face is enough, you thought. You looked up at the sole and gulped. Bad memories came back to you, yet you lifted your head up for the kiss. Lips getting closer and closer, as you were inches away from virtually kissing your masculinity away. Your beautiful teacher smirked victoriously.

'There we go' she cooed, as if congratulating a terrier for learning a new trick. Then her face suddenly changed. Her eyes shot viciously at you as she put her foot back on the ground. 'How does it feel? How does it feel being a lowly creature, a mere possession to be played with? As she was saying this, her breathing rate and voice volume increased. You just looked at the ground away from her. 'I suppose you don't like it. I'd even say you detest it.' That touched you. You did hate it from the depths of your heart, yet you were forced to commit to it. You felt your stomach turning sick and a burst of emotions swell inside you as your breaths became faster. 'I can see it in your eyes boy. The burning hatred and the suffering. But the fact that you can't do anything about it kills you the most. But you know what?' She asked kindly. You didn't want to hear it. You were About to confront her, but she quickly shut you off: 'I really don't fucking care, now kiss my left sole, you shoe-kisser.'

Defeated, you puckered up and planted a losing kiss to her sole. The degradation was too much. You felt your eyes well up but somehow, you contained the tears undetected. She then just stood and stared at you. She suddenly let out a girly giggle, making her sound so innocent, one would simply not be able to see how she can be so evil. You shrugged and were about to stand up when your teacher gracefully placed her right foot over your left shoulder, making you unable to stand up.

'I kissed your shoes, may I now please leave? My family's waiting for me.' Even though hating your family, you'd rather stay with them than this "monster".

'Uh-uh. Didn't you hear your grandma? You're mine until she talks to your mother about your ownership. You better obey until she comes back. Anyway, let's go to my office where you will ............. You cringed.
111112211112111212.title: You kiss your dignity away.

She's going to use you as a footstool.
1111122111121112121.content:
'Follow me, now' said the blonde sternly. You got up and walked behind her. As you walked down the main corridor of the school, you looked at all the pictures of other students' achievements, with them smiling happily at you. It was dreadful. The walk was like the walk you take to your execution, but for you, it was much worse. Goodbye to all you've done in school. Your future was literally in front of you, and there was nothing you could've done to stop it. Was it? You'd probably get mercilessly beaten if you'd try anything at all, but other than that, you just had to accept it and walk forward, literally. You glanced at your teacher's walking style. She made quiet, but quite ''slap-like'' footsteps with her black work flats. You shuddered at the thought of touching her feet, but, again, you were powerless.

You walked for about 5 minutes forward, than took a right turn, and there was a brown,oak door with her name on it. She got her keys out and started unlocking the door. That short moment seemed like hours to you. It was in the end the moment just before your next task. She opened the door, turned around and smiled. 'Come on in! she said very excitedly. You stepped in and looked around you. It wasn't very big, that's for sure, but in the end, she wasn't the headmistress. There was a small wooden desk, painted in a dark, grey color. A black wheeled-chair was tucked into the desk. There wasn't much left in the room, just a couple of boxes and a wall shelf, also in that dark-grey color, with various folders piled on top of it. 'Not a bad office' you thought.

Next, she untucked her chair and sat down with a sigh.'What a day it has been. I'm so tired. Hopefully a little massage will help me out.' She said the last phrase with a wink. There was a space underneath her desk just to fit a person kneeling, and you waited for the inevitable to happen.'Now get down on your knees just under my desk. You heavily sighed and reluctantly got on your knees, allowing you to enter the small compartment. You turn around just to see your teacher's pantyhose-covered knees coming in on you. You backed off, but your back would only go that far. So, you ended up with her knees inches away from your face.

'Do you feel trapped down there? she laughed gleefully and moved back a bit, allowing you more space. Shen then longingly asked 'Could you take my shoes off please?' You just got on with it. There was no ''no'' answer, you knew it. So you quickly grabbed her left shoe and slipped it off her pantyhose-covered foot. It came off easily as for he foot being extremely sweaty so no friction could happen. 'Ah' she moaned, annoying you for being used as a tool.'Feels so good to have my shoe off after a day of work. Oh well, you wouldn't understand anyways. Get to the other one,now!' You didn't hesitate and quietly took her other flat off. There smell wafted to your nose and you recoiled in disgust.'Get to massaging my tired feet now, you little servant' she said meaningfully.

You tried to close your eyes as your hands got closer and closer to her left foot. Then, you touched. The feeling was horrible. It was so wet and moist. It was almost abominable. The slick sweat stuck her pantyhose to her feet like a very good glue. You started kneading at her sweat-saturated toes. Her toes' length were from long to short, her big toe being the longest. This made her foot a convenient surface to massage, as you only had to use your thumbs for her toes. You continued to press your now soaked thumbs into her toes for next 5 minutes. She just moaned and said 'I could let you do this the whole day if I wanted to.' That was enough to motivate you to work harder. Your small spot under her desk was becoming intoxicated by the smell of her feet. It made you feel light-headed and dizzy, yet you continued by moving on to her soles. That was the worst spot. The sweat was abundant and when you squeezed it, it almost poured out. You just quailed and moved onto her heel for the next 10 minutes. After those 10 minutes were over, you drew back and waited.

'That was blissful Stan. You were born to be a servant. Now-now, move on to my right foot. You repeated the exact same procedure, your hands only becoming more sodden with gross foot sweat. From then on, a strong feeling of rancor developed towards your teacher and it only became worse. You finished her massage and kept thinking about how bad your hands would smell. 'I have never experienced a better feeling in the world, Stan. You really have talent. Talent my ass, you thought. She obviously scoffed you just to make it all the worse. To subdue you. You truly loathed her.

'Because you've done such a good job, it's only fair for me to return the favor' she said cheekily.
1111122111121112121.title: Her wish, your command.

11111221111211121211.content:
She then unexpectedly pushed both her stocking-covered feet in your face. As you had little to no space in the small compartment of under her desk, you couldn't push them off your face and ended up smelling them in their full glory. You tried to open your eyes and you could only see the ball of her foot and stretched nylon. Then she started to press the ball of her foot into your right eye. This forced you to close your eye and ''admire'' her right foot. She then starting alternating between pressing her right foot and her left foot. It was like a rhythm, a really annoying one though. All this time she ignored you, as if you weren't there. You could only hear the monotone click of her mouse and her slow breathing.

Her feet suddenly rose and her heels were lowered over your eyes. She then started digging her smooth heels into your eye sockets, causing an unpleasant stinging feeling in your eyes. At least her heels weren't rough. She kept going until she spread her toes over your forehead and lightly tapped on it. Some sweat dribbled down your nose and some even went into your mouth. A stale air floated around you, encasing you like a cocoon. You felt your eyes starting to water as she applied more pressure into your cheeks with her soles. This cause sweat to squeeze out of her hose-covered feet and spread all over your face. It was like she made a face mask of sweat. Absolutely disgusting. You kind of got used to the smell as your nasal receptors accommodated with the toxic chemicals emitted by her rancid feet.

At one point, she just spread her big toe from her second toe and placed her foot right over your nose, encasing it in well-worn pantyhose. The air you breathed in was filtered through the used hose, making it difficult to respire. However, it was the air you needed to survive, so in the end it ended up being as if her repugnant smell was a life-keeping source. This thought nearly made you puke, but you dared not to. The consequences were unknown, but definitely not pleasant. You tried to speak, but the sounds you produced were suppressed by her soles placed firmly against your mouth.

'Are you trying to tell me my massage is on point? No need for that. I know it'' she said very cheekily. She talked like she was playing a game and everything that was happening was a joke. Her attitude was unbelievable. 'How crazy can a person get?' you thought. Just as you were thinking that, the unpredictable happened and she said...

You didn't want to do this, you wanted out of her, you wanted to be free of feet for the rest of your life!

The day continued on like that with most people just mocking you or ignoring you as you. Why not? Your life was ruined already. It couldn't get any worse! And just as soon as you had that thought pass through your head you realized... it can always get worse. Gina liked the idea and said as much. So did your grandmother though she also had a suggestion. Why limit it to just you three why not invite everyone who wants to compete? 1111122111121112211.content:
They decided to have a large foot smelling contest. This was awful. Just awful.

Even worse was Gina's mother's request to have it at the nursing home! The nursing home! Why? More crust old lady feet! Ugh you felt like you want to puke just at the thought of it.

Amy was ecstatic at the suggestion however and quickly set the date and posted the rules on Facebook. Everyone would pitch in $50 and then have two days to get their feet as smelly as possible! The mere thought of it was making you feel ill. Amy had a few suggestions too.

"Going to the gym is a great idea but for the old folks that may not be possible. So what they can do is wrap their feet in plastic bags and submerge themselves in a bath. Their body will think they are hot and so will start to sweat and they will sweat in the bags that are wrapped up tight so the water couldn't get in."

Grandma loved the idea and would tell all of her friends.

Gina also knew a few friends who would love to participate as well as your Aunt. This was going to be a nightmare!

As they finished talking Amy was done with you and handed you off to your mother who wanted a massage since her feet were already mostly clean.

"I will miss having Stan's tongue licking my feet clean these next couple of days."

"Oh I'm sure you will," your sister remarked. "But you can still use him for massages, and having him sniff your feet can be very relaxing. He can also tell you how much worse they are getting!"

You whimpered a little causing all three of them to cackle with laughter. You shuddered at the mere thought of your mother's feet getting smellier let alone the dozens or more others who you would be under!
1111122111121112211.title: Large Foot Smelling Contest!

11111221111211122111.content:
You had spent the last two days suffering under Gina and Amy's feet. Your grandmother had gone to the nursing home and was providing tips to the other contestants. Between Gina and Amy it looked like Gina was winning but Amy was going on about her 'secret weapon' that had you nervous. You knew they were hitting the gym in ratty old running shoes with no socks. When they had gotten home the squelched witch each step. And the smell... oh god it was awful.

You were driven tot he contest and despite your will being so broken they took the precaution of handcuffing your wrists behind your back. You were marched into the large open area that was packed with people. There were 75 contestants! You would be under each pair of feet for two minutes, meaning 150 minutes or two 1/2 hours. You now saw the reason for the hand cuffs as you desperately wanted to run away but you couldn't!

There were a number of contestants, most of them old folks but that wasn't all of them. Here were the list of important contenders.

Obviously there was Amy, Gina and your grandmother. These all would be horrid you knew. You still weren't sure what Amy's secret weapon was but her feet were wrapped in several socks and big boots so you hadn't experienced the smell yet. But beyond that there were a few others that you thought would be particularly foul.

There was your cousin Erica. She had long, fiery red hair framing her deceptively cute face. Despite her otherwise athletic build and toned body, she still somehow manages to keep a noticeably full bosom, and is wearing a low cut top to show it off. Along with that she has on one of her usual short skirts to display her well formed legs, her pale skin is flawless. She was athletic so you knew she could generate quite a bit of sweat! She wasn't alone either as she had brought her Asian friend named Sakura who was short and looked a bit goth like. Her feet were encased in heavy goth boots and you could just imagine how much sweat they would be producing.

Among your Grandmother's friends there was an older black lady named Mildred. She was FAT. She had to weight at least 350 pounds and her fat feet were covered in plastic bags, you could see condensation on the bag itself and you shivered in fear of what kind of stench would be unleashed by her unholy feet.

There was also a thin older woman in her 90s. She looked like death warmed over and she was incredibly frail. However everyone was keeping their distance from her... you could only guess it was due to the sheer stench of her feet. Her name was Patrica.

"And now the foot contest will be about to begin. We have our unbiased judges, the staff of the nursing home. They will monitor little Stan's heartbeat and look at how vivid his reactions are. To make sure my freaky little brother gets a good whiff we'll be gagging him with his other mother's socks!"

Your mouth was forced open and the nasty sock shoved in. It was then wrapped in duct tape. There would be no opening your mouth. You moaned and the crowd cheered.

"Now let's get started who is going to be first!?"

111112211112111221111.content:
The first one up was Mildred. The lumbering woman in her 70s gave a big laugh and sat down in the smelling chair that you were now trapped under. You were scared of what was about to unveiled and you were right to be. Even with her feet wrapped in plastic you could already get a hint of the bitter stench around her feet. And considering the bags were practically air tight... that wasn't a good sign.

Amy held up a timer and said, "You've got 10 seconds to get your feet ready and then the timer begins!"

The ten seconds started ticking and Mildred quickly undid the bags. A wave of noxious fumes rolled over you. Your heartbeat spiked and your belly roiled. You tried to get away but one of her hulking sweat drenched feet was pushed down on top of your face. You screamed into your gag in raw horror at the smell of her filthy dark feet. It seared your lungs and brought tears to your eyes. You screamed again and desperately tried to hold your breath.

"Look at him squirm!" Mildred shouted out to the judges who were taking notes on your heart rate and your wiggling. It was clear to everyone there that her feet were absolutely massacring your nose!

Holding your breath worked for a little while but you couldn't hold it for two minutes! No way! And her slimy feet were positioning themselves over your face so that when you did inhale it would be right in between her toes! As your lungs burned your body forced you to inhale. The rickety, rotten egg on steroids smell engulfed your world and sent your lungs screaming for fresh air. You blew out of your nostrils, barely being able to get any air in and then instinctively inhaled again. You literally began hyperventilating with your nose tucked in between her size 15 crusty old feet!

Naturally this made it all the worse for you! Every other second you were inhaling and smelling the toxic air. You were seeing stars in your eyes, this was far worse than even your mother's feet! You tried to twist away but her heavy feet pinned you in place good. Two minutes? It felt like TWO HOURS. Time seemed to slow to a crawl and you wept not just from the burning smell but because of the hell you were in.

And then the timer rang out. It was the sweetest sound you have ever heard. Her nasty feet were lifted up and the smell receded a bit. Already though they were helping the next person sit down. You screamed in your gag and tried to slither away despite being hand cuffed but two of the female orderlies put you back in place. Oh god... not another one!

Who was next?

Her little piglet like toes had to be sucked individually, it was putrid.

"Yeah keep lickin 'em hun. Ah yeah, I love this shit!"

Needless to say you hated her. You hated her and every last one of these old cunts. And as much as she enjoyed you, she didn't hog you completely.

Soon it was time for an endless parade of old feet. Some were crusty, some were small, some were filthy, some were clean. But all of them had similar desires. They wanted you to massage them, lick them, get off the dead skin and trim the toenails. Some even had pedicure sets with them that you had to use. It was an exhausting and wretched day filled with feet and very few breaks.

It was now night time however and you weren't leaving the nursing home. What would you be doing at night?

1111122111121112211112211111.content:
Your service wasn't completely finished fro the day yet. No as top dog of the Nursing Home Mildred was going to require you to sleep under her heavy feet! At this point you were so broken down you just meekly obeyed. You were given a bed that was perpendicular to Mildred's and you had to lay part on it and part on her bed right where her feet were.

Her feet weren't too smelly but that was only because you had spent so much time cleaning them with your mouth! Throughout the night they did get sweatier and you hated that. But the biggest issue was how heavy they were. It was impossible to sleep with those two mammoth appendages on your face! It was a long and awful night, when the sun rose Mildred got up as well.

"Heh heh, have a good night foot boy?"

"No it was a very difficult night."

"You tryin to say something about my feet boy?"

"No ma'am I'm sorry just not used to sleeping in another bed." You wisely evaded her question.

She gave a harrumph and made you kiss her feet. You started to make the rounds when there was a surprise visit from Gina and your grandmother.

"And how is my grandson treating you all?"

Mildred laughed. "He's been fine. He event slept under my big ole feet all night!"

Your grandma laughed. "We'll have to remember to do that to him when he gets home!"

Gina was wearing a pair of black heels that clicked on the tile floor. She looked at her son and said, "Is that how you are supposed to greet us? Didn't Amy tell you that you should always kiss our shoes or feet when you see us?"

Amy had said no such thing to you! But you wouldn't put it past her to lie about it to get you into further trouble. So instead you hastily apologized and crawled over and kiss those shiny black pumps. You also kissed your grandmother's loafers too.

Gina smiled down at you. "I'm so proud of you Stan. I always worried about your future but now you have a purpose in life. It may not be the best purpose in life but see how happy you've made everyone? You should take solace in that."

That wasn't any consolation to you but you were never going to speak a contrary word again. It would only end in worsening conditions for you. Instead you simply non and Mildred laughed.

"Wow you gots him trained reaaaaal well."

Your grandmother nodded. "My granddaughter does good work! She was always able to find out how to make a raw deal good. I don't think she ever wanted a brother but now she's got him licking people's feet and she's enjoying the good life on vacation thanks to winning the smelliest feet contest!"

Another lady shouted out, "Hey if you aren't using him, I need him to lick my bunions!"

The thought made you sick but then again so did the thought of licking your mom and grandmother's feet!

You sniff in between her toes, around the balls of her musty feet and her arch. Mildred enjoyed it and then announced. "Oh while he finishes up let me see if everyone has finished their collection yet!"

It was a whole nine yards foot service. Your mother sat down as well and propped up her feet on your shoulders as you served your grandmother. The weight was distracting but not as distracting as the smell emanating from her feet.

Once you were finished it was your mother's turn. Her high heels were taken off and the scent of unwashed flesh surrounded you. You coughed mildly and Gina giggled a bit. "That tickles honey. All right now do a good job!"

"Yes ma'am."

You started to lick at the perspiration on her feet. The salty substance curdled your tongue as it clashed with the taste of dirty skin. You couldn't help but grimace. That ticked your grandmother off who kicked out with her big foot and hit your side.

"Don't be rude young man."

You turned to Gina. "Sorry for grimacing at your feet mother. I'm sorry."

She laughed. "Don't apologize to me honey, apologize to my feet!"

You suppress and sigh and turn to her feet. "I'm sorry for being rude to you feet. You are very nice and I'm just a rude boy."

They both grinned at your submission. You returned to your task, careful to control your features. You lick every inch of her feet and even rain down some kisses to get back in your mother's good graces. You aren't sure if it works but you get no more kicks to the side. Right as you finish Mildred the overweight old black lady arrives.

"Ah you're going to love this. We are going to make our foot boy here eat a special meal!"

You look at the medium sized bowl she was carrying. At first you don't realize what it was. It looked mushy with... oh god it was toe nail clippings. And it was in some kind of watered down muck. What the hell was it?

Your mother asked the same thing.

You almost lost your breakfast right then and there! You were obviously looking sick to your stomach because you saw victory dance in Mildred's eyes.

Oh damn the texture... the taste.. the smell... the pure horribleness of it causes your body to spasm. Mildred leans against the chair and then pushes her foot down on your head.

"Come on eat it boy!"

Some of it went up your nose and you let out a whimper. You kept eating though since you needed to get the pressure off the back of your head! Finally though you were finished and she let you up.

Gina smiled. "Good job Stan! I wonder if you could live off of just that?"

Was she joking? Just being playful? Or was she serious???

You swallowed heavily. Your aunts were mean and they had always favored Amy. You had your work cut out for you!

Your mother's sisters were Sarah and Anne. Both had large feet but Sarah's were massive, I mean really, really massive! They were not just big for the family but big for any family, frankly you thought she might even be the world record holder for big ugly feet!

Your mother and sister drove to their house and you were quickly shoved inside their joint home. To save money both of their families had moved into a large home and split the rent.

You crawled to them and kissed their big feet. When you finished kissing their feet you were ordered to continue while your mother and sister explained.

And then your mother just turned her back on you and walked out the door.

Pain exploded across your body as Sarah began stomping on your prone form.

"Beg your mom to save you huh? Don't want to lick my feet huh? You'll pay for that you bastard! Come over here Anne help me teach this waste of air a lesson!"

Amy was elated. Stan was horrified. His mother was totally serious. Gina then sealed his fate. "Also Amy, Your teachers said that you have been getting all your homework done lately...."

You should have known that it wouldn’t stop there. You know that if you don’t hold out, she will make more people addicted to her feet and you will all become her slave. You are the last hope, the only chance for a cure and to stop this.

“Well Stan, it I need my feet cleaned and it looks like you don’t have much of a choice. ” Amy laughs as she hovers her foot inches from your face.

“No… eckk… I won’t…” The stink is too powerful and you begin to move your head left and right trying to escape the foul smell. Amy follows your movement with her foot and shakes the remote to remind you of the consequence of disobeying her. You dread being shocked again, but it cannot be worse than this. Anything would be better.

“Excellent choice, Stan. I was wondering how well this collar works. Now we get to find out.” Amy responds.

She cranks it up to a 7, meant for larger breeds like Pitbulls. *BZZZZZTTTTT* The shock sent a lightning bolt of pain through your neck. The electricity is excruciating and you writhe in pain. “Why are my feet still dirty? Is my foot cleaner going to start obeying now?” Amy taunts. She is becoming agitated by your refusal.

“No…. I….” *BZZZZZTTTTT* *BZZZZZTTTTT**BZZZZZTTTTT* she sends three consecutive pulses and you can’t bear it anymore. “YES! YES! Please I will do it!” you concede to her demand. Slowly and reluctantly you extend your tongue until it makes contact with the bottom of your sister’s foot. The salty and cheesy flavor makes you want to hurl. Amy is reveling in her accomplishment. You slide your tongue across the bottom of her foot and try to keep from swallowing the revolting residue of her workout. This ends up being worse because it is now stuck on your tongue and you are forced to unwillingly savoring the taste. You decide to swallow and feel it course through your body. You being to tear as you realize you have no choice but to continue. You can’t give up… It will be over soon…

She lifts her foot and inspects your work. The outline of gunk on the ball of her foot is gone and is now inside of you. “Not good enough Stan. You’ll need to use your teeth to grind the dirt off of my heels.” Obediently and fearful of another shock, you carefully go to work and chew away the dirt from her foot. You swallow and know that your next task will be to clean the gunk from between her toes. Without further instruction, you snake your tongue in between her toes, cleaning anything you find. The black nuggets of lint and grime find their way onto the tip of your tongue. You were hungry moments ago, but you are becoming full. The sudden realization that the disgusting contents sister’s feet have become your dinner is almost too much to bear. Finally, you have finished and all the filth has been removed. You breathe a sigh of relief since it is finally over.

Amy once again demands to know where you are keeping the serum. Calculating and manipulative, she must have known it would come to this. There is still another foot to clean and it is still in her running shoe, sockless and sweating as you were cleaning her other foot. It will be even worse than the last one and you can’t do this anymore. You are weakened and beginning to break just as she planned.

“Well? Tell me where you are keeping the serum!” Amy demands.

You know that she is serious and hates when you dare resist her. She hasn’t even maxed out the shock device and once you clean her other foot she will think of something much worse. It will never end until you finally cave. Amy is smarter than you, she has already proved it. Either way you are going to be her slave.

Your voice is frail and you fear the consequences, but you answer…
113122211111111222.title: She demands the serum

1131222111111112221.content:
Regretfully you relinquish your serum’s hidden location to her and respond “Please Amy… I can’t do this anymore… I will tell you.” She pauses and awaits your response. “I stashed it underneath my floor board by my computer desk. It’s all there… the research notes, the formula, 2 vials of the serum… everything….” There is no hope left. You just gave up your only chance at freedom. Amy now has everything she wants and you have nothing left to bargain your way out.

Knowing she broke you, Amy becomes ecstatic and laughs uncontrollably. She has finally done it! Once you are addicted she will have an unlimited supply at her disposal. With complete control over you, you will be forced to create more of the serum and infect anyone that she chooses. She will be a real princess and everyone will have wait on her hand and foot or slowly suffer. Your friends, neighbors, maybe even entire school will soon become possible targets.

You lie bound at the bottom of the recliner helplessly awaiting your fate. Amy goes upstairs to retrieve the long awaited fruits of her labor. She approaches you with the vial. Your own project is going to be used against you. What a horrible twist of fate. She looks down at you with a wicked smile. ”Open up Stan… or should I say Slave! Time to take your medicine.”

Your will to defy her is all but eradicated. Knowing there is no alternative and that she outsmarted you every step of the way, you just obey. This serum changes nothing. You have always been her slave, and at least now you won’t find it so repulsive. The liquid finds itself oozing down your throat. With a final surrender you willingly swallow the “medicine” and seal your fate.

Amy unties you and you see your mother still sniffing away at Amy’s shoe. You rise to your knees before your new princess. Though the serum has not fully taken effect, you have already sees the effect it had on your mother and there is no escape. Within a day you know you will already be in crippling pain without her feet. You do not want to offend your sister and risk being denied them. ”How may I serve you, Princess?” you ask awaiting Amy’s orders as her new slave.
1131222111111112221.title: Give up. Tell her where it is

choices: Show off my slaves
Enslave Erica too
11312221111111122211.content:
You must prove your devotion to your sister. You just suffered through cleaning one foot, but now she demands that you finish cleaning her other one…willingly this time. Still wearing your collar, you realize that you must comply. Gina is called over to serve as her foot rest. As Gina assumes her position, Amy takes her foot and mashes Gina’s face down into her running shoe. Her face makes contact with the slimy and foul smelling insole, but she does not dare complain. Amy lifts her feet and begins resting them on her mother’s back. Relaxing with an arrogant smile, Amy turns on the TV and allows you to go to work with the snap of her fingers.

You now know your place and crawl on your hands and knees to her. The stench has become more putrid than the last foot that you just cleaned and now her soles are slightly dirtier from the trip upstairs to your room. You begin with long licks from heel to toe, picking up the dirt and swallowing the contents that stick to your tongue from each lick. Gradually, her foot is becoming clean and the filth and pungent odor is transferred to your mouth. Broken and now obedient, you continue to nibble away any dirt that is ingrained and in her lightly calloused heel and thank her for the privilege.

Confident as the owner of two new slaves, she contemplates what she should do next. As she is relishing in her accomplishment, she spreads her toes to give you better access to whatever debris that you might find. Defeated, you swirl your tongue in between collecting any bits that have stuck between your goddess’ toes. There is some dirt under her toenails and you use your teeth to scrape it out. Knowing she has won, Amy decides to explain the new rules of her house:

1. You will always refer to Amy as “Princess” , “Your Highness” or another name that shows her status above you.
2. You must always be available to receive commands.
3. When she returns after prolonged periods away, you must be on your knees and kiss her feet as she walks through the door.
4. You must obey any and all commands given quickly and without hesitation.
5. Failure to obey any command will result in severe punishments as she sees fit.

Amy has the whole summer left to be waited on. You and your mother will be at her beck and call. “Gina will be going to work tomorrow and continue to pay the bills. Stan, you will be serving me throughout the day.” Amy explains.

Terrified of being away from her goddess, Gina begs “But I need to be at your feet, Princess… I can’t be away for very long.”

“Hmmm… This is going to be a problem. Stan, this is your formula. What can we do?”

“I’m sorry Goddess, we need the taste or smell of your feet. Without it, we will start to fade maybe even die! We can’t leave, there is no way.” You reply realizing that you are trapped.

Amy pauses for a moment. Suddenly, an idea comes to her. “ I will have to give you princess treats to take with you.”

“Princess treats?” You reluctantly ask.

“You will be giving me pedicures daily. If you are good slaves, I will let you save vials of foot sweat, toenail clippings and pedegg shavings to sustain yourself throughout the day.” Amy tells you. “But… if you are bad or disobey me, you will have to suffer without them.” She cautions.

She is right. As long as you eat the “princess treats” that she generously offers you, you can survive throughout the day and return back home to serve her before any adverse symptoms take hold. “Gina will need some for tomorrow, so you can start by trimming my toenails.” Amy offers.

You recognize that this is the only way and you really don’t have a choice anymore. You grab the pedicure set from your sister’s room and return to Amy who is still using your mother as a footstool while her face is buried in Amy's old running shoe. Already used to the royal treatment that she is receiving, Amy ponders how she will enjoy herself over the next few days. Amy decides “ I think I am going to invite Erica over. I want to…”

113122211111111222112.content:
Amy is not satisfied with only her mother and brother as completely obedient slaves. Now, she is demanding that Erica too becomes helplessly under her control. With only one vial left, you caution Amy that this is the final dose remaining. She is bent on enslaving more people and will need much more for her army of servants. In fact, she wants you to rework the formula to be easier to administer. Convincing people to ingest the serum is taking too long, so you are offered a choice.

If you create more, you will be allowed to continue to service her feet and may even earn an extra ration of pedegg shavings for your efforts. The alternative was to endure 3 days of isolation trapped a dog cage without any source of her feet. Considering the effect that 2 days of abstinence had on Gina, it is almost certainly a death sentence to refuse Amy and she knows it.

You were once a brilliant student and had a decent life. You made an unfortunate mistake to create this formula in the first place. Now in just a few short days, you and your mother have become helpless groveling worms beneath Amy. You will live in servitude for the rest of your lives and require her feet for nourishment. Amy will continue to selfishly use this over you to get her way. You must treat her like a goddess or suffer the consequences.

Although you fear the consequences of disobeying Amy, you also miss being able to research. With enough time, you might even be able to research a cure. If you choose to make more of the serum, you will have to start from scratch and figure out how to make it more infectious. Perhaps aerosol or on skin contact could work and you have a few other ideas. With a formula that is so potent, it will not be long before she has the whole school enslaved or worse…
113122211111111222112.title: Enslave Erica too

Amy orders you to use the formula on Erica now
1131222111111112221121.content:
You give Amy a foot bath and lace the contents with concentrated levels of Serotonin and Dopamine, the happiness and pleasure chemicals of the brain. Her sweat seeps in and blends into the perverse cocktail. The new formula is now more potent and creates a much more willing slave. Since Amy’s feet will be fused with high levels of the pleasure chemicals released in the brain, this new serum will encourage willing obedience to her. This new formula can be applied in many more forms as well. The old formula required the subject to directly consume the serum, but this can simply be sprayed as a mist or absorbed through skin contact. Once a person has contact with the formula, Amy’s pheromones will trigger an inexplicit desire for people to obey her. The catch is that anyone will have to be nearby her for it to be effective.

Amy wants you to test your new formula on Erica so she is invited over for a ‘slumber party’. Amy makes the call and Erica agrees to head right over. At about 11am hear the door bell and Amy tells you to answer. Erica shoves past you and she sees Gina preparing lunch in the kitchen. “Looks delicious Gina! I hope you made extra!” Erica says.

“Thanks…” Gina replies almost ignoring her and focusing on her task.

Amy calls out from the backyard to Erica “Hey, I’m out back by the pool.”

Erica heads through the sliding glass door to meet Amy and you follow right behind. Amy is lounging in the sun in a bikini and has her feet propped up on a pillow. Erica takes a seat and reclines in the chair next to her.

“Alright, get back to work and finish painting my nails.” Amy orders you. You kneel and resume your position before her and work on your task. “Yes, Amy…” you respond a little embarrassed to be seen by Erica.

“Yes WHAT?” Amy angrily corrects.

“Yes, Princess…” You quickly respond, careful to avoid direct eye contact.

“Haha what?? Did he just call you Princess?” Erica bursts out with laughter. “I can get used to this!”
“He is my slave now. If you think that is funny, you’ll love this…”

Amy reaches to the small table next to her and grabs a bell. She shakes it *DING-DING DING* “Slave, I am ready for lunch now.”

Gina immediately heads to the backyard to serve lunch. She drops to her knees and serves a platter of sandwiches with the crusts cut off and a side of fresh fruit. Erica can’t believe this and stares in disbelief. Amy takes a sandwich slice and orders Gina to set the tray down. “It is hot out and I am starting to sweat. Start fanning me.” Says Amy.

“Yes, Princess. Right away.” Gina picks up the fan leaf sitting next to her and fans Amy as instructed.

Erica is in shock. Usually both her and Amy torture Stan while Gina is away, but now Amy has managed to enslave both of them. Envious of the treatment that Amy is receiving, Erica wants to be pampered too. She walked to your house in flip flops and you see that her nails are chipping and she needs a pedicure. There's a light dirty outline of dust on the bottom of her feet but they aren’t too bad.
1131222111111112221121.title: You agree to make the serum

11312221111111122211212.content:
Amy gives you the nod that was rehearsed ahead of time and you know that it is now time to begin the plan to enslave Erica. Amy says “Stan, rub Erica’s feet. She must be tired from the trip over here. And use that special spray to help moisturize. Chop, Chop”.

Erica is excited to have you as a willing slave and puts her feet in front of you, ready to receive the same royal treatment that Amy is getting. She is laughing at how well you are Gina are trained. “Yeah Stan, get to it! You heard her, rub my feet Slave hahaha.” Erica has been torturing you with Amy for years. Always making you worship their stinky feet while Gina was away. Things are about to change and Erica doesn’t even know it.

You take the reworked formula and spray towards her feet to ‘moisturize’ them. The new formula can be effective either through smell or direct contact as you designed. Using it on Erica this way will guarantee that she becomes a helpless, willing servant under Amy’s control. As you apply a second application, a light breeze flows through the yard and a waft of the spray blows across Gina’s face. As commanded, you begin your task, gently messaging the concoction into Erica’s soft size 10 soles. The addiction rapidly starts to takes hold. Already you see that Erica is intently focused on Amy who is relaxing while Gina is feverishly fanning despite the intense summer heat. You know Gina must be exhausted, but she suddenly becomes more passionate in her task, ensuring the comfort of Amy above all else.

You begin to think of the times that you were a brat to your sister. From her silky black hair to her perfectly shaped pink toes that are meticulously pedicured on a daily basis, you know that she is truly a goddess. Why did you always have to give her such a hard time all these years? She should be treated like royalty. Wait… is this the formula that is making you think like this?!? You have it all over your hands. You blindly followed your orders and accidentally exposed everyone to the new formula.

Erica is now overcome with and inexplicable desire to serve Amy. Without any instruction, Erica asks “Amy… err… wouldn’t you like a foot massage instead? Stan and I could both rub your feet…”. It must be the serum! Everyone is trying to please Amy. You realize what is happening, but your hunger to please your sister is too great. The formula is making it impossible to resist Amy anymore.

“Oh my feet must stink. I have been sweating out in this heat all morning. I will just make one of my slaves do it.” Amy casually says, realizing that it must be working.
Erica is becoming jealous of both yours and Gina’s position as Amy’s slaves. Again, she asks “I uh… I could… I could be your slave…” Erica insists.

“YOU want to be MY slave? Well, you will have to obey my every command without question.” Amy replies. “If you really want to be my slave, you will have to get on your hands and knees and beg me…”

Surely Erica will refuse. Nobody would actually beg to be another person’s slave. Then you notice Erica pull her foot away from you. Slowly, she starts to get off the patio chair. As she steps off the chair, Erica drops to her hands and knees and starts to crawl to Amy. With her face now just inches from Amy’s soles, Erica puts her hands together and pleads “Amy… please… please let me serve you. You are a goddess and I am just a lowly servant. I’m not worthy but please let me serve you.”

Satisfied, Amy places her foot upon Erica’s face. “Kiss your Princess’ foot, slave. Prove that you deserve the privilege to be under my feet.”

Erica eagerly accepts her position as Amy’s personal servant. She claps Amy’s left foot in her hands and begins placing loving and passionate kisses on the bottoms of Amy’s sole. You crawl next to her and await an opportunity to be of use to your sister. Amy has complete control over her 3 slaves now. Realizing this, she says “Enough Erica, my flip flops need cleaning. Look at the grime that has stuck to them. Your Princess shouldn’t have dirty shoes, should she? Clean them with your tongue. I want them spotless.”

Amy’s flip flops are resting on the ground next to her chair. These are Amy’s old flip flops that she has had for the last few summers. They were once white, but there is a perfect gray outline where her toe and heel prints have stained them. This degrading task will be the ultimate test of your formula and Erica does not hesitate. Still on her knees, she moves her face toward the ground to Amy’s shoes. She drags her tongue across the top lifting the dirt and swallowing it. She pays particular attention to the toe prints and licks in a circular motion, slowly cleaning each individual mark before moving to the next one. Gradually, Erica’s tongue is turning gray as it continues to be used as a scrub brush to clean Amy’s dirty flip flops.

Seeing the total obedience that she now has over all of you, Amy is pleased with your reworked formula. She extends her foot and pats your hair like a dog. Normally, you hated when she teased you with her feet. Now, you are thankful to be serving her like this. “We used to fight all the time Stan, but look how happy you are serving me. Isn’t it much better like this? You can kiss my feet as a reward for all the work you did today.”

You had to agree, Amy is right. Serving her feels like a reward itself. “Yes, Princess. Thank you.” you say in between kisses.

While staring down at you kissing her feet, Amy says “I have bigger plans for you Stan. Summer is almost over and school will be starting soon. You and Erica will be serving me, but that isn’t enough. We will need more of the formula. When I dismiss you, I want you to create more… enough for the whole school!”

Amy enjoyed the rest of her summer being waited on hand and foot by her 3 slaves. Erica was not exposed to the first trials of your serum and her symptoms are not as severe if she is away from Amy’s feet as they are for you or Gina. Amy allows Erica to go home each day, but she must first get permission from Amy after her chores are all done. However, you and Gina still need Amy’s feet, although you actually want to treat Amy like a goddess now.

Summer has ended and Amy has trained you all to serve her well over the last couple months. She took the master bedroom and your old room was converted into her personal shoe closet. Your lab is still available if she commands you to work there. Each night you and Gina have been sleeping at the foot of her bed because Amy likes to feel your warm breath on her feet while she is sleeping. Since you will be heading to school soon, your usual morning routine will be little different than normal. It is 6am and Gina heads downstairs to have breakfast ready. After about 30 minutes, breakfast is prepared so you wake up your Princess by gently kissing her feet until she wakes. “Good morning, slave. Are you excited for school today?” Amy asks as she lowers her feet onto the floor.

You place Amy’s slippers on her feet as you have been trained to do. “Yes, Princess. We will finally be able to get more slaves for you.”

Amy smiles and you both head downstairs. Once Amy takes a seat at the table, Gina serves Amy her breakfast and you and Gina crawl under the table and wait for any commands. She plops down a piece of her French toast onto the floor and presses her feet into it, ripping it into a couple pieces. She scrunches some between her toes and lifts her foot to Gina’s face and offers her a bite. Gina gladly accepts and makes sure to clean of any crumbs that are still remaining on her daughter’s foot. Amy places her foot on top of the rest of the French toast that is still on the floor and lets you nibble at whatever you can get at. Since her foot is covering most of it, you have to work your tongue around her toes and try to dislodge your breakfast. Amy loves playing these kinds of games with her slaves. Having warm breath on her feet all night makes her feet sweat and she loves to make you clean them each morning before she takes her shower.

The sweet taste of her feet is a treat you get each morning with the scraps of breakfast that she offers you if you behaved. Your packed lunch is even infused with her foot gunk so that you don’t have to suffer withdrawals in class. Today you will be eating peanut butter and toe jam sandwich for lunch. After breakfast, Amy showers and gets dressed. She heads to the front door and has Gina kneel on all fours. Amy takes a seat on her back and holds her foot up for you to place her shoes on her feet. She wears her now spotless flip flops that Erica licked clean and heads out the door to the bus stop, leaving you to carry her backpack.

The first day of school begins and you and Amy are in a few of the same classes. First period is social studies and you both take your seats. You have Ms. Smith as your history teacher. She is the social studies teacher and is a petite red head. She’s only five feet tall with short bright red hair. She loves making the boys sweat in her class and she loves standing over them while they were at their desks. Her green eyes always hold a hint of sadism as she stares unruly boys down. She hates you and was the only B you got last year even though you worked harder than any other student. She always seems to give the girls better grades and treats the boys worse for no reason. The teacher hands out the textbooks that you will be using this year and lets you know that tomorrow we will be starting to learn about Egyptian history and culture. You have already learned about this and decide it is a perfect opportunity to get everyone to worship Amy. “Ms. Smith, could we try something new this year? Maybe do some visual learning. Someone could be pharaoh for a day and everyone will have to listen to them.”

Knowing how much Amy usually tortures you, your teacher loves this idea. “Great idea, Stan. In fact, how about we let Amy be our first pharaoh this week since resembles the Egyptian pharaoh Cleopatra.” No doubt that your teacher knows how much Amy bullies you and wanted her to humiliate you in front of the entire class. Unfortunately for her, you have come to the realization that Amy is a goddess already. This is exactly what you had hoped for. This is going to be the perfect opportunity to use the new formula and turn your classmates into Amy’s servants.

The next morning you and Gina follow your typical ritual before getting Amy ready for school. You pack a couple bottles of the new spray serum to take with you for class. This morning Amy dresses the part as an Egyptian Goddess. She is wearing a white sun dress with a golden belt across her waist. She has black eye liner on and golden glittering flecks adorning her legs making them shine. Just a little lower she is wearing her sandals that have straps running up her slender calves and with black painted toenails. She looks like a royal descendant of Cleopatra herself! When you both arrive in class you see that Ms. Smith had the drama club build a mock throne for the pharaoh in the front of the classroom.

So smell them and become her little slave"

Matt still tries to resist "Sniff...sniff.... no, I don't wanna be your slave..sniff...sniff....I...can't.....I...just.....love your stinky feet mistress....sniff....sniff, ahahah"
Then he begins to sniff and smell her feet with passion and Amy says: "See? It was only metter of time before you would become my foot slave, and now you will help me to convert your friends as well, starting with Paul....it could be nice to have him smell and worship my feet"

"Yes princess, as you desire, everyone should kneel before you and obey" says Matt between sniffs.
Smiling Amy says to her brother: "As for you, my most faithful servant, I will give you a reward for your fantastic job"
And smiling her brother takes her other foot and start worshipping it.

"Now, nothing will stop me, ahahahah" Amy says laughing
1131222111111112221121211.title: A new ability

choices: You can't take it anymore and obey Amy
You still try making a cure
11312221111111122212.content:
Amy stares at you, with a smug and silent smile, hands on her hips she enjoyed any single seconds of her victory.
" Are you seriously asking this ? You dumb idiot.... What do you think would make you usefull ? Hm ?" She asks in a almost dispasing and patronising way
You were surprised by Amy's harsh words, but you made sure to speak in the most respectful way possible, she had you by the balls now.
" I don't know, maybe you want a foot rub Princess ?" You ask in embarrassment, you didn't want being near her reek feet for sure but maybe it was what you were supposed to answer.
*BZZZZT* Your collar sent a powerfull thunder through your body. "WRONG ! " Amy let a growling laughter as she mocked your gesture. After a good ten seconds of laughter she removed a tear from her eye using one of her slim finger then spoke again " Already addicted to my pretty feet ? Ha ha ! You won't have them that easily slave, you'll have to work for it- You'll make me more of those potions."
You didn't want to offer her the possibility to enslave more people, even less being near her corn chips-smelly feet. You looked at Gina in the corner, hungrily sniffing into the hole of Amy's shoe, a shiver went through your whole body realising you were the next one in line.

* BZZZT* *BZT* BZZZZZZT* The shocks occured again as you wiggled around from the pain, "Go on ! Move - time is ticking! " Teased Amy, you were left with her evil laughter echoing in your head as you rushed towards your lab.
There was no way you were helping your evil sister with whatever she had in mind, you'll figure out an antidote, and heal your mother and yourself, then you'll have your revenge.

Hours passed and so did your tests, unfortunately you hadn't figured out a cure yet, it was way more complicated than expected.
Amy entered the room abruptly making you startle inthe process. Gina was standing behind her, holding a plate with food and water on it.
She stood arms folded at the entrance and pushly looked at you.
"Are my potions ready ?" She casually asked as she took a coke from the plate and began sipping.

"N..Not yet Princess, I'm missing some ingredients for that ." You tried to sound confident about it, Amy didn't look to appreciate it though and a tremendous shock came from the collar, sending you immediately on the ground. " Wow, so that's an 8 ? Pretty powerfull stuffs you bought me girl !" She mocked at her mother, talking to her in such a degrading way, she even pet her on the head. Gina only answered with a shy nod and faint smile without saying a word.
"But back to business,why didn't you fetch those ingredients then? Are you that stupid ?" Amy had taken steps forwards to look at your face, you felt really intimidated from that and glanced at her feet, you already could feel the potion had taken effect, you really wanted to smell them right now... Knowing this feeling will only be worse hours after hours made you cringe.
"I'm sorry princess, it's just, I don't feel so good, I wondered if I could just take a whiff ? " You bit your lips as you asked it.
Amy paused, processing what you've just asked and a wide grin immediatly appeared on her face soon after. She gave you a slap accross the face before taking her pushy voice.
"No no no Slave ! That doesn't work this way... I already told you- My feet are your reward for the potions, as long as you don't provide me what I ask, you won't be anywhere near my feet! Follow us now freak." She leaded the way towards the living room where she ordered you to stay at a corner, you had to endure looking at Gina giving her pedicures and foot rub, she looked like both of them appreciated any second of that while as time passed, you felt more and more addicted.
Amy sometimes gave you attention by ordering you to bring her stuffs or just zapping you with the remote for fun.
The next day...

1131222111112.title: Gina complies

choices: She accepts
She wants to humiliate you
11313.content:
“Please Amy. Isn’t there anything else that you would rather have? What if I give you half the allowance money that I earned this summer? That’s like $100!” Anything would be better than suffering at your sister’s mercy, even if it means handing over your hard earned money.

After pausing for a moment, Amy says “Fine, but I want ALL of it. I know that you weaseled away at least $300 between your allowance and birthday money. Oh, and one more thing, I also want you to agree to take the blame for me the next time that I should get in trouble. Kind of like my own personal get out of jail free card to use whenever I want. Gina is always giving me a hard time for not doing chores and I don’t want to get grounded this weekend because I have plans. Do we have a deal?”

That sounds reasonable. You agree to cover for Amy the next time that she would get in trouble and give her your entire summer’s allowance that you had earned to make this deal. This will be no problem. She will probably get in trouble later this evening for not doing the dishes or something stupid. Gina always gets upset when Amy doesn’t do her chores. Worst case scenario, you will probably end up doing the dishes and won’t owe Amy anything after that. You’ll be free at last. You hand over the money that you have been saving for the last couple years and make the deal with your sister.

Later that evening, Gina comes home. As she is unloading the groceries and bringing them into the house you hear a loud crash in the dining room.

***SMASH***

Something in the other room breaks into a thousand tiny pieces. Undoubtedly, this was your clumsy sister who just used up her little get out of jail free card. After this you are free and clear. Now she has nothing over you.

“What just happened?!?” Gina asks

“It was Stan!” Amy quickly responds.

You agreed to take the blame, and whatever she just broke is now your fault. “Yeah… sorry Mom, it was me. It was just an accident.” You admit, although you still aren’t sure what was broken yet.

As it turns out, Amy had probably been planning this for a while. She broke your mother’s expensive antique vase. Gina was always telling guests how expensive it was and you knew it costs well over $2,000. When Gina heard that you broke her vase, she was furious. This may have been a mistake.

“Stanley! You know better than to play rough in this house. What were you thinking?!? You are grounded until further notice young man! You can forget about any plans you had for the next few months!” Gina angrily exclaims.

“Wow, I can’t believe Stan would do that to Mom. You should make him earn back the money to replace it. It only seems fair since we both knew to never play rough in the house, especially around the vase. You had to have told us that a hundred times.” Amy suggests. She is the one who actually broke it just to get you in trouble. “In fact Stan, I will let you earn some money. I’ll pay you for your services to help you to earn back the money to pay Mom.” You can’t believe it. Amy is going to be the golden child and allow you to “earn” money by slaving around for her. She is going to be ‘helping’ you to pay back mom with your own money!

“No, Amy that is redic—“ you begin to protest but Gina cuts you off mid-sentence and declares that it exactly what you are going to do.

“What a great idea, Amy! This will teach you to respect other people’s things, Stan. I worked very hard to save the money to buy that vase. Now you are going to earn the money to pay me back.” Gina explains.

“Please Mom, it was Amy! I swear!!!” You helplessly plead.

“Stan, your sister is so generous to offer to help you. You already admitted that you broke it. I can’t believe that you would be so rude to her. She is spending her hard earned allowance to help you out. The least you could do is a few chores for your sister. You are going to do whatever she asks her and thank her. You need every dollar that you can get.” Gina coldly responds. She is agitated by your denial and is ignoring your pleas.

“But Mom… please… Amy did this! She is being a manipulative bitch!” you blurt out. You weren’t able to hold it in anymore. Amy just manipulated your mother into grounding you for the next couple months. Now she is forcing you to serve your sister who is going to pay back with your own money! This is ridiculous. You will never be able to pay back the cost of the vase and Amy just took your entire savings. You are essentially stuck as an indentured servant for the foreseeable future.

“Stanley! I don’t know what has gotten into you! You need an attitude adjustment. You are going to earn back the money and that is the end of the discussion!” Gina says.

You know you’ve been beat. Gina won’t listen to anything that you have to say. You hang your head and thank Amy for ‘helping’ you. “Th-thank you, Amy…. for helping me pay back mom…” you admit defeat and thank your sister.


“I was just going to ask for a foot rub, but now after you just called me a bitch I don’t think I should let you.” Amy says. She crosses her legs and sits confidently in front of you, awaiting your response. Clearly she is going to humiliate you for calling her a bitch.

She has got to be joking. You don’t have a choice anymore and she knows it now. She is going to make you beg for the privilege to massage her nasty, stinky feet! She is wearing flip flops and you can see a light outline of dirt on the bottom of her heels as her foot dangles in front of you. She is smacking her flip flop against the bottom of her foot impatiently while she waits for your response.

“Please Amy… can I rub your feet…” you recite like she expects to hear. You just want to get this over with.
11313.title: Other

choices: You work for Amy
You work for Gina
113132.content:
You can tell she is relishing in the predicament that you are in while she thinks what to do next. She gets to boss you around and to top it off, she is now mom’s favorite. “Hmm... I don’t know, Stan. That didn’t sound very sincere. How about you kiss my feet too? I will give you a nickel for every time you kiss each of my feet until I think you are sorry for calling me a bitch? Maybe you’ll learn to respect me a little more and you might be able to earn a couple extra dollars if you pucker up while you’re busy rubbing my feet hahaha.”

Surely Gina would have never made you stoop so low, but after your outburst this is an opportunity to correct your behavior and to make you show respect to your sister. “I think that sounds fair. He is already grounded until he pays back the money for the vase. With that language, I think kissing your feet will be a fitting punishment. You used that foul mouth to insult your sister, now you can use it to apologize to her by kissing her feet!” Gina demands. She is still livid and now she is siding with your sister despite her ridiculous request.

There is no use in arguing. You pull the ottoman over for your sister her to rest her feet on. You pick up her left foot and begin removing her flip flops. “Ah-ah-ah Stan. Aren’t you forgetting to get a pillow to rest my feet on? Go fetch your pillow from your bedroom .That should work just fine.” Amy commands. She is not going to make this easy. You comply and ‘fetch’ your own pillow to serve as a cushion for your sister to rest her dirty feet on. You place it on the ottoman before her and finish removing her flip flops while she continues to act like a spoiled brat.

“Oh and don’t forget to fluff it too. I want to be comfortable.” She smugly adds. Here you are stuck on your knees on the hard floor while she sits above you on the couch. She’s relaxing and enjoying her foot massage, and she is worried that she won’t be comfortable enough?!? She is taking this too far!

She is humiliating you just for the fun of it. She is trying to push you as far as she can so have another outburst. Once you do, she will use it against you so that Gina will let her get away with torturing you however Amy sees fit. You are already on your knees rubbing and kissing her feet until she dismisses you. If you are not careful, Amy will find a way to force you to be a groveling, foot-licking servant and convince Gina to let her do it! This isn’t fair. You already paid her and this wasn’t part of the deal.

You don’t want to escalate this any further so you comply and shower her feet with kisses until your lips hurt, occasionally thanking her and apologizing in between kisses. After about 10 minutes of groveling, she shooshes you by placing her big toe on your lips and making a *Shhhh* noise. “That’s enough talking, I want to watch TV now.” She flips on the TV while her and Gina relax and ignore you as if it were perfectly normal.

Amy still has you continue with your task of rubbing and kissing her feet while she nonchalantly takes selfies above you and leisurely flips through the channels. You resume as commanded, but now silently endure your humiliating task. She occasionally moves her free foot in front of your face to make sure that you don’t miss kissing any spot of her grimy little foot. Every so often she gloats and degrades you by saying things like “Harder peasant, your queen is not satisfied” or “It’s so hard to find good help these days”. Gina giggles and says “Oh Amy, you are being terrible to your bother.” But she does not stop her.
After nearly an hour you have kissed your sister’s bratty feet from heel to toes hundreds of times and your hands are cramping. “Did you learn your lesson, Stan? Aren’t you so lucky to have a big sister that is so thoughtful?” Amy asks.

“Yes Amy… thank you.” You reply against every fiber of your being. She is being a bitch, but there isn’t much that you can do. At least it is over…

“In fact, I am sooo thoughtful that I think you should give mom a foot rub for being such a brat today, my treat!”

“Wow Amy, that is so sweet, but my feet must smell terrible. I had such a rough day at work and then spent a couple hours shopping. I couldn’t make him endure that.” Gina meekly responds.

“Nonsense! He won’t mind. You deserve it after everything that he put you through today. Stan get over there and get to work. That’s an order. “ Amy commands.

“That is so sweet of you, Amy.” Gina accepts her offer.

AMY is so sweet!?! She isn’t doing anything but giving you orders. You just humiliated yourself at her feet and now you have to endure this?? She is trying to convince mom that you can be essentially used as a slave so she can get away with much worse later. Gina would never have made you do any of this, but Amy is manipulating her so well. Any time you protest any of Amy’s demands it only confirms that you are being bad and need to be taught a lesson.

You pull the ottoman over and Gina props her feet up on your pillow. They are nearly twice the size of Amy’s! God, the smell is awful and they are slightly calloused from years of neglect. You cringe as you begin to massage your mother’s feet. At least Amy’s feet were smaller and softer. This will take twice as much effort. You are trying to keep as far away as you can but the stench is still so strong. Your arms are completely outstretched and you have got your head turned away to try to avoid the smell while you rub them.

Unfortunately it isn’t good enough. “Harder Stan, I can barely feel it.” Gina instructs. You have no choice, you lean in and your face is now just inches away from her clown sized feet. “Ah, yes… right there.” You are reluctant to breathe through your nose, but the smell is so cheesy that you can almost taste it if you breathe through your mouth. Gina feels the warm breathe against her feet and realizes how bad it must be for you. She feels sorry, and offers to let you stop. Before you can answer, you notice Amy shoot you a quick glare and she shakes her phone toward you, motioning that you better continue. She recorded everything! You were kissing her feet and she is using it to blackmail you. Without her even saying a word, you know that you can’t stop rubbing Gina’s feet or Amy will humiliate you in front of everyone.

“No… eck.. err… it’s not so bad, Mom…” you barely squeak out in between labored breaths. It actually is that bad but Amy just wants to see you suffer and you can’t refuse.

“Well, you can’t say that I didn’t offer. Thank you for this, Amy. I could really get used to this treatment! It was so nice of you to offer to pay for this foot rub. I really needed it.” Gina praises Amy. Her feet are moist with sweat and your thumbs slide up and down easily without even using lotion. For the next 45 minutes you slave away and inhale the stench of Gina’s cheesy feet while massaging them. It starts to make you light headed but you somehow manage to push through.

Finally Gina has had enough and lets you stop. Her giant feet left a nasty stink all over your hands and it is even ingrained in your pillow. It’s finally time for Amy to pay up. You had to kiss her feet nonstop for over an hour and then rubbed Gina’s putrid feet. That’s got to be worth at least $50, probably even $100 since Gina’s stinky feet are basically like working around hazardous material. $100 isn’t much but it would be a start to regaining your freedom. Surely Gina cannot expect you to pay the full amount. How pathetic that you are right back where you started and now you have to do whatever Amy says and Gina won’t protect you. Gina is starting to like the idea of having you work around the house to wait on them both hand and foot.


“I lost count when you were kissing my feet, Stan. Here is $2.00 for your services tonight. That sounds fair, doesn’t it? Amy offers with an evil grin.

$2.00?!? A whole afternoon of slaving for your sister and you are virtually no closer to paying off the damages from the vase that SHE broke. You still owe $1998.00 and you just humiliated yourself at her feet. Surely your mom won’t allow Amy to treat you like this!

“That sounds a little low, doesn’t it Amy? I mean it isn’t even minimum wage and poor Stan had to endure my stinky feet. What do you think, Stan?” Gina replies on your behalf.

You know Amy is purposely testing you. She wants to show everyone the video of you on your knees kissing her feet. You will be the laughing stock of the entire school and no girl will ever date you if she shows that video.

“No, Mom. That’s fair… Amy is right.” You can barely believe the words coming out of your mouth. You’ll be stuck as a slave for the rest of your life at this rate. Amy tricked you into paying to be her slave and convinced Gina that she can basically pay you pennies. This couldn’t get any worse.


“I suppose I could hire you to do a few more things unless mom needs you to do anything…” Amy offers.
