1141.content:
You knew the only way she could tell mom was through her cell phone, your family ditched the home phone years ago, and that she puts it next to her while she swells, on her dresser. If you could get that away from her tonight and keep your distance, you'd be in the clear from her for at least the week. Until then, you laid here under Amy's feet, silently stewing while she watched her shows. Occasionally your big sister would scrunch her toes over your nose and move your head around or twirl your hair with her big toe. But when she cupped her feet around your nose, that was the worst she could do to you. The stench was putrid, it would disgust a zombie. You tried to turn and squirm against her, but Amy would just laugh and press down so you couldn't.

"Oh Stan, you idiot, we've been over this already today. You could never get away from me, you're my slave, remember silly?" She slapped your face with her foot. "You know what I want now? A good suckling." She jams her foot down your throat, the stale taste of a long days work barefoot on the hardwood floors of your house combined with her accumulated sweat overwhelming your senses. You start gagging,which causes her to smile and get up, using your face as part of the floor.

Stretching, she glances down at your half covered face at yawns. "This has been a long day, I'm tired aren't you?" She kicks hard in the ribs. "Go on, I'm done with you." She turns and begins to walk away, then stops. "Actually...follow me."

You get up slowly and painfully, only to get have her knee in the balls, crumpling you. "On your knees dog. You don't deserve to be on the same height as me." She rolls her eyes and walks to her room, you sitting up against the foot of her bed. Suddenly, Amy begins her process of getting into a nightdress, so you turn away, only to be awarded with a slap on your wrist with cuffs. You're attached to the bed! All of your dreams come crashing around you as she slips into bed. "Nighty night slave!"

You can see her phone on the nightstand, she left her door unlocked and open, it was tantalizingly close. You tug on the cuffs and slump down in defeat.

11412.content:
You sit on Amy's floor in her bedroom, one hand cuffed behind you to her bed frame, going over your new future virtually attached to her feet. It's a horrid thought, one that you'd rather not see become a reality, so you start looking around her room for anything that can pick a lock to handcuffs. There's nothing directly in front of you except her open door, a sign of freedom tantalizingly close, nothing to your left or your right besides a desk, her closet, and a wardrobe. You sigh and do your best to lay down for the night, but you see a glint under her bed,a hair clip. You stifle a shout of excitement, god forbid you wake her up, and lean forward to grab it. Just out reach, you stick your leg under her bed to kick it out or pull it towards you and just barely, it makes it to you. Then setting to work, it's not long before a click penetrates the silence of the house.

You cringe, waiting for the signs that Amy's up and mad, but they don't come. Just managing to contain your excitement is draining, and you sneak up very quietly and cautiously to her dresser, which is right next to her face. Just as you pick up her phone, the one lifeline she has to telling mom on you, she groans and rolls over. A bead of sweat trickles down your forehead, and you slowly back out of her room, only speeding up once you make it halfway to your rroom, slamming the door hard and locking it.

Sure enough, that woke up your sister, but you don't care. You're home free for the week, and her pounding on the door in rage only makes your victory sweeter. All through the night she screams and hollers, threatens and promises, but you both know you have the upper hand for now, so she eventually retreats back to her room. You turn and gaze at your room, which probably has more than enough Doritos, root beer, and video games to sustain yourself for a week, only to realize with agony that it's your moms room.

If you try and open the door to sneak to your room, little miss psycho will hear and come destroy you before you make it anywhere, but your moms room is barren besides her bed and closet, the only good thing being that she has her own separate bathroom.

Do you dare make a break for it? Or try and hold the siege out here?

It was the beginning of summer , Amy just came back home. At this time she was fourteen almost fifteen, she was wearing flip-flops, a pair of jeans and a simple t-shirt.
"Hey Stannie Boy, I'm home and I bought you some candy!" she called out as she came into your room. You looked at her and smile : " Thank you I love youuu" but as you were trying to take the candy from her hand , she pushes you back on the ground with her left foot. " Ah it will be too easy to just give it to you like this , now that you are a big boy if you want something you must earn it " she said while you were still on the ground . ' What are you talking about , I've already thanked you , what more do you want ?". Amy looked at you with a look you've never seen before ( her future dominant face), takes off her flip-flop and puts her left foot on your face. " It's very simple, just kiss my foot and I'll give them to you". "What, are you nuts Amy why would you want me to kiss your foot , they are disgusting and sweaty". Amy laughs and explains " Yeah, I know but today in school one of my teachers, a young and attractive woman made one of the students kiss her feet in order to teach him a lesson and I found it so cool I wanted to try it myself". Thinking she was just kidding, you play along and kiss her foot gently. Amy bursts into laughter as she took her foot off your face : " Thank you Stan , it was fun , here is your candy", then she walked out of the room with a big and yet weird smile on her cute face. She began putting her socks and shoes back on and goes to her room to get her car keys. Erica pumps her fist in celebration at the news. "OK Stan, just go ahead and lean back against the arm rest beside you, I'll take care of the rest!" She exclaims, grabbing the TV remote and beginning to flip through the guide. You lean back, one leg off the couch, the other bent at an angle as you face Erica.

Without even looking at you, she begins laying down on the couch, and snakes her feet up your body, until they finally perch up on your face, your nose caught between the balls of each feet and her big toes. You are immediately assailed by the stench, and her feet are still fairly sweaty, leaving a damp feeling on your skin. You shudder inwardly while she glimpses over at you and she wiggles her toes, which are partially obstructing your view seeing as they reach up to your eyes. "You need to start breathing deeply Stan, I want you to really enjoy the aroma!" Erica teases as she turns her attention back to the television. Inhaling deeply of your cousins disgusting foot smell, you just steel yourself for the long haul, as there's no telling how long Amy will be gone. As if reading your mind Erica says "We're going to have soooo much fun my little foot boy, just you wait and see!" and you frown, knowing damn well it won't be any fun for you, that's for certain.

Amy emerges from her room with her purse and her car keys in hand and can't help but laugh at the familiar sight of you with feet on your face. "Now you be a good slave and treat your cousin's pretty feet really well. Play your cards right, and you might just get TWO pairs of girlfriends, you sly dog you!" Amy says as she walks past, ruffling your hair as she goes.

Erica seems to settle in as the door shuts behind Amy, and she wriggles herself into the couch, then looks at you, smirks, and begins wiggling her feet across your face as well. Giggling like a little girl, she then begins to rub her smelly feet up and down your face. The sweat smears across you cheeks, your nose, your forehead, and even your lips. The smell is ungodly, the heady scent of her unwashed feet enough to bring tears to your eyes. She begins scrunching her toes over parts of your face, pinching your cheeks, and squeezing your nose and you just simply lay there and wait for it to come to an end as usual.

1523111112.content:
"Er, yeah...anything," you reply with an increasing amount of uncertainty creeping into your voice. The excitement in Erica's shining blue eyes fills you with trepidation.

"Well in that case..." She grins at you, a giggle escaping her lips. "My feet could really do with more attention..." Her voice is more than a touch ominous in tone.

Knowing that you are completely at your cousin's mercy (the idea of her relaying your hasty words to Amy means you cannot possibly give her any more ammunition) you grimly nod at her, trying your best not to look too panic-stricken.

"And as you looovve my feet being all over your face, I think it's only right that you lick them. Sound fair?" There is a clear smirk planted on her face, so gloating that it forces you to concentrate on staying as calm as possible: the last thing you need is to say something you'll inevitably end up regretting!

"Uh, yeah. That's...fair," you reply, hating yourself for being such a submissive wimp. But what else can you do?

Flexing her bare feet in front of you, Erica giggles as she moves them forward. The heavy stench begins to swirl around and enter your nostrils; it is truly rank! Wishing you anywhere else in the world right now, you prepare for yet another disgusting experience that will be forced upon you! Hovering both soles in the air, Erica tosses her red hair back behind her casually - it's almost as though what you're about to do is standard. You really are nothing more than a pathetic loser to her!

"You can lick them now," she says in a smug, self-satisfied voice. As before, you know that suggestions from Erica or Amy are actually direct orders. Sticking out your tongue, you reluctantly place it in the centre of your cousin's right sole, the sharp, cheddary flavour dominating your tastebuds instantly. Almost gagging from the bitter, acrid taste, you focus on pleasing your cousin - your punishments will only get worse if not - as you start sliding your tongue up to her toes.

After the relentless worship of your sister's feet not too long ago, your tongue is more than a little sore. Compounding your humiliation is the fact that Erica's gloating expression is in clear view, just over her wiggling toes. Working your way back down your cousin's foot, you try your best to do a good job. Your tongue swishes from side to side against her heel; this causes her to giggle, though that could be well her mocking you in general!

"Ah Stan: you're such a good foot boy! You must feel so lucky to get to lick my bare feet!" As she chuckles at you, she firmly twists her left foot against your cheek so that your attention is focused on her other bare sole. "I can definitely see myself getting used to this..." She sighs contentedly while you drag your tongue up and down her sweaty sole. Stretching her legs out a little, her bare feet push over your face so much so, that you allow a small groan to escape from your lips. Still, you keep lapping your tongue all around her bare soles: along the arches, to the balls of her feet, in between the toes...all the while desperately hoping Erica will let you go. This continues for at least a quarter of an hour, although it seems like much longer.

Strangely, Erica's feet suddenly go quite still; even the toes stop wiggling. A slight grunt confirms it: Erica has dozed off! Snoring gently, while she has her feet pushed firmly in your face! A feeling of relief swoops over you - you can stop licking at last! This is soon replaced by an unshakeable panic...what if she sleeps for, like, an hour...or more?! All you can smell and taste is the strong, foul odour of her putrid feet!

A rash thought enters your head: what if you subtly move Erica's feet away so you can get some fresh air? You feel a glimmer of hope begin to build; if you could just get hold of her phone, and her cloud were still on the screen, you could delete the video! Is it worth taking such a great risk...?

The longer you consider reaching for the phone, the more you realise that it's simply too risky. So, instead you sink your head back against the couch as far it will go. Still, that doesn't prevent your nose from having the rank stench of Erica's foot odour swirling around it...

Yes, Erica has not moved her feet an inch! While she dozes, her soles are quite still as they continue to push and press against your unfortunate face. Having to lick her feet was humiliating enough but, in a way, this is even worse! The fact that you are too afraid of antagonising her in waking her goes to show how intimidated you are by your admittedly attractive cousin.

Holding your breath for as long as possible, you start to sense your face going red. Allowing just a quick shot of oxygen into your nose, you immdediately cringe at the horrible, vinegary smell that assaults your nostrils: like a dangerous weapon, destroying your defences. The putrid stench, coupled with the soft feel of her bare soles on your face, makes you feel genuinely inferior. You begin to wander, in your increasingly desperate state, if this is what you deserve. Maybe you were just born to be dominated and abused by strong women; or perhaps, you had done something in a previous life that warranted this unfair treatment now!

Erica suddenly lets out a small moan, startling you somewhat, but giving you hope that she could wake - then let you go...

But it's just a temporary noise she has made in her sleep. Ruing your cowardice and fear of upsetting your cousin, you allow a small, pitiful moan of your own to escape your lips. You are well and truly trapped here, and there's not a damned thing you can do it about it! Closing your eyes in a state of despair, you futilely try to drop off to sleep yourself. But it's impossible; it would be a bit like asking a fish to walk on land! There's no way that your mind will switch off, or your senses relax enough with the disgusting odour of Erica's bare feet wafting all around you.

You have no real sense of time; what if she doesn't wake up for a few hours...?! You know that you have to make a choice here: meekly suffer and cringe under your cousin's raunchy feet as she sleeps for God knows how long, or do something that would wake her up, but not give reason to displease her in any way...

Perhaps it's that you're panicked to the point of foolishness, but in your current predicament, you decide that the only way of waking Erica (that would not risk passing her off) is to lick her feet!

Hating the fact that you feel you are being forced to do something so disgusting, you slowly extend your tongue out until it gently prods against several of her toes. As before, a sharp, cheddary flavour overloads your senses and makes you splutter, though only slightly. Your cousin grunts; has she woken...? No, of course she hasn't! Deciding to press on - literally in this case - you lap your tongue out with more vigour, absorbing all of the unpleasant, bitter flavour that Erica's powerful soles have to offer. You pause, mid lick, hoping that there will be some stirring, or sign that she has started to wake. But nothing! In fact, she starts to snore a little louder, the rumbles shaking her body ever so slightly, forcing her feet forward a little, into your unwelcoming, helpless face.

Knowing you have to make your foot licking more pronounced, more clear, you resolve to make more of an effort! Flicking your forward so that her soles arch back slightly, you swish and swirl your tongue around, desperately, in order to wake her up. The rank taste of her feet is bouncing up and down your tongue, forcing you to moan and gag a little automatically. Still, you continue, pushing and forcing your tongue to lap up as much of her feet as you can conceivably manage. There seems to be no foot sweat now; that's already been absorbed by your mouth and now swallowed reluctantly. The very thought of that makes you cringe - so does the fact that her feet still taste horrendously awful!

Why won't she wake up? Surely anyone else would begin to awake from their slumber with their feet being licked at this velocity?! You dearly wish that she would just snap out of her dream! Is it even worth continuing with this foot licking torture if it's proving to be completely ineffective? You pause for a moment, your tongue practically stuck to the middle of one her soles as you consider your options...

As the musty, heady scent cascades across your nostrils, after you try tilting your head to the side, you decide to stay as still as possible: this way, the horrible aroma may start to subside...

But it doesn't! After what feels like hours later, your eyes are leaking and your breath is raspier than ever. Torture does not even do this justice! Why, why can't she just wake up?!

"Stan, what are you doing?" The familiar voice of your sister rings across the room and makes you sigh inwardly, but relax slightly at the same time - at least the foot smelling-session with your cousin can stop...

Erica stirs and mutters something incoherent, then stretches her feet forward, not even slightly bothered that her stinky soles squash into and slide around your unfortunate face.

"Oh, I must have nodded off for a sec. Stan - were you still licking?" She asks you, her eyes suddenly narrowing as she looks at you. "Why isn't your tongue out?"

"Hmmmf...I..mmmffff!" You struggle to sound even remotely coherent with your cousin's dirty feet dominating you.

"Oh I can answer that one," Amy says with relish. "When I walked in, he was smelling your feet but he wasn't licking your feet..."

"What?! Stan - what did we agree?" Your cousin's voice is both dangerous and ominous.

Still you're unable to articulate yourself so you resort to making squealing sounds, while Erica clamps her feet more tightly over your trembling mouth and nose.

"Don't tell me he didn't lick your feet properly! Stan - there's no way to treat two more of your potential girlfriends!! Next you'll be telling us you want to break up with these two!" Your sister says with faux-concern while wiggling her bare feet. She clearly enjoys the fact that you have given them something to berate you with!

Erica goes silent, pushing even harder with her feet than before. info.description:
Restoration complete, all options not taken are now open to all to add as they wish!!

Your mother is planning on taking a week long trip to visit her mother out of state. While she's gone, your older sister is in charge, and she plans to do exactly what she always does when she gets you alone. Forcing you to smell, kiss, lick, and otherwise worship her feet, no matter how much you beg her to stop.

For as long as you can remember, your sister has always been dominating you in one way or another ever since your father left and your mother started putting her in charge while she's away. Your sister abuses her authority at virtually every opportunity, and has framed you for countless misdeeds on the rare occasions you dared to defy her will. This has only reinforced your mother's faith in your sister as the responsible child and you as the "rebellious" troublemaker. While you could almost certainly overpower your sister physically if you wanted to, nearly a decade of abuse at the hands of your older sister has ingrained your submissive attitude toward her in your mind, and the very thought of raising your hand against her simply never arises.

I have merely restored this story (Most of it was copied, some of it is from memory) after it had been deleted/lost for some reason. If the author deleted it intentionally, I'll leave his name out of it. If he contacts me, I'll put him in here to give him the credit he's due. I do take the liberty to revise any grammatical and spelling errors that took place as well as replace any one sentence story entries 'cause those are bullshit if it's not a choice chapter. I also tie up any plot-holes and elaborate on any pertinent information that was otherwise left out. I've also take the time to ensure that all entries are done in the second person as the original author intended. Other than that it's as close to the original as you can get, and you should feel free to add on and keep this story alive and growing.

Main Characters:

Amy- Your older sister, she's 20, about 5' 7", 150lbs, with fairly long black hair, dazzling green eyes, and an hour glass figure that would drive you insane if it were on anyone other than your sister.

Gina- Your mother, she's 44, about 5' 9", 160lbs, with shoulder length brown hair, hazel eyes, and a figure that rivals your sisters, but age is starting to take a toll, albeit slowly, and she's still as ravishing as when she was 30. She has been divorced for about 4 years and you haven't seen your father since.

Erica- Your cousin, she's 21, about 5'4" 135lbs, with long fiery red hair, blue eyes, and a spectacular rack.

Alyson- A friend of Amy's, she's 20, about 5'2", 140lbs, with long dirty blonde hair she often ties up into a ponytail. She has a killer body, baby blue eyes, and you've had a crush on her for years. Too bad she's such a bitch.

Jessica- A friend of Amy's, she's 21, barely 5', 155lbs, with shoulder length dark brown hair and soft brown eyes. She has a lithe athletic build but still has curves in all the right places.

Stan- Our main character and who all this "unfortunate" mess is being inflicted upon. Let's just assume he's of average height, build, and weight. He is 18 years old.

Rules:

1: No gay or bisexual interaction without including a warning in the choice. All foot fetish content however is to be F/M and F/F only.
2: Keep the focus on feet, the occasional shift in focus to another body part may be ok as long as it's done in moderation.
3: No scat, farting, pissing, lactating, vore, or killing of any characters.
4: Large entries are not only encouraged but preferred. However, please don't make entries that are just one massive block of text, use paragraphs, please!
5: Other than choice chapters, no entry should be less than one paragraph long, with a minimum of three to four sentences.
6: Sexual interaction between Stan and either his sister or mother are acceptable but shouldn't appear until about a dozen or so decent sized chapters in.
7: Stick to second person perspective
